Constructor Detail

Cylinder

public Cylinder(world.Vector pos,
                double radius,
                double height)
Construct a cylinder at position pos and with given radius and height. Other specification are default setted by WorldObject.

Parameters:
pos - Cylinder position (center)
radius - Cylinder radius
height - Cylinder height
See Also:
WorldObject

Cylinder

public Cylinder(world.Vector pos,
                world.Vector rot,
                double radius,
                double height,
                java.awt.Color color,
                int phong,
                double specularReflexion,
                double diffuseReflexion)
Construct a cylinder with given parameters

Parameters:
pos - Cylinder position (center)
rot - Cube vector rotation
radius - Cylinder radius
height - Cylinder height
color - Cylinder color
phong - Cylinder phong coefficient (control amount of phong effect)
specularReflexion - specular reflexion coefficient
diffuseReflexion - diffuse reflexion coefficient
